title: Ashita e Free Kick
overview: Godai Shun is a young boy who likes football. But his grandfather, a successful businessman, wants his grandson to follow his path... Godai is hesitant to follow his grandfather's plan; but does Godai become more and be high-ranking CEO, or does he want to be just a normal stress-free high school boy. Should Goidai follow his plans for football, or should do as his grandfather pleases?
